dcterms:description: The PASCAL Context dataset contains 10,103 images annotated into 540 classes, where 4,998 images are used for training and the rest for testing. The authors only consider the most frequent 59 classes for evaluation.
dcterms:title: PASCAL Context

dcterms:creator: B. Zhou
H. Zhao
X. Puig
S. Fidler
A. Barriuso
A. Torralba
dcterms:description: The MIT ADE20K dataset consists of 20,000 images in the training set and 2,000 images in the validation set, with a total of 150 semantic classes.
dcterms:title: MIT ADE20K

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran
S. Ramos
T. Rehfeld
M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset contains 5,000 images of street traffic scenes, with 2,975 images used for training, 500 for validation, and the rest for testing. A total of 19 classes are considered for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes
